column2: Shares of Tesla dropped as much as 12% Friday before closing down 10.3% after CEO Elon Musk tweeted that the company's shares are priced “too high.” The company just days before reported a strong quarter, sending shares higher.May 1, 2020

column1: Is Tesla stock a buy now?
column2: Tesla is looking like a good deal to Jefferies. The firm on Monday upgraded shares of the automaker to "buy" from "hold" while lowering its price target to $650 from $800. That implies a 35% upside from where shares closed at $480 per share on Friday.Apr 6, 2020
